description._content: On Thursday, December 6, 2012 the organizers of GO were joined by project staff, artists, and voter participants for a public conversation about the successes and challenges of the project. Moderated by Kevin Stayton, Chief Curator at the Brooklyn Museum, active audience participation was encouraged throughout the evening with the following helping to spark a dialogue: Shelley Bernstein, Chief of Technology, Brooklyn Museum, and co-organizer of GO Sharon Butler, GO participating artist and publisher of Two Coats of Paint Victoria Cho, GO Crown Heights Neighborhood Coordinator Brian Dupont, Brooklyn-based artist and author of Artist’s Texts Alice Griffiths, GO voter, freelance writer, and Brooklyn Museum Member Sharon Matt Atkins, Managing Curator of Exhibitions, Brooklyn Museum, and co-organizer of GO Naomi Safran-Hon, GO Featured Artist Gabrielle Watson, GO Featured Artist www.gobrooklynart.org
